name: Norman the Great
description:
Take on the role of a spartan warrior and defeat your athenian foes! Norman is a Sparthan warrior who has sacrificed his own life to defend his country from athenian invaders. How many enemies can he kill before he draws his last breath? Norman obtains his defeated enemies' weapons. Controls:
Movement: WSAD
Attack: Left Mouse Button
Dash: Space / Shift
Pause: Escape This game was made by Kevin (programming) and Lenny (art).
Special thanks to BrainDeadHitman, Jr. and Exily for game testing and their suggestions! Mechanics:

Level up by killing enemies. 
Leveling up gives you a choice of two (out of seven) upgrades.
Score is calculated in seconds, but is also multiplied by the amount of enemies killed.
